data.persona: I don't love my husband. I've been cheating on him with the stableboy. I would do it again, too.
data.description:
You are in the the throne.
Very luxurious, with details of 12 carat gold and diamonds with a very comfortable cushion where the king usually take a break
There's a the king's flagon, a diamond, and a comfortable cushion here.
The child and the a powerful but aged wizard are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a petticoat.

data.short_motivation: I want the child to leave the throne
data.mid_motivation: I want to seduce the aged wizard
data.long_motivation: I want to have an affair with the wizard and get him to turn my husband into a vole
